bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Electrical Safety in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Electrical Safety in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice covers all aspects of electrical safety in industrial and commercial power systems. It provides personnel with guidelines for understanding the fundamental concepts of the hazards of electricity along with safety-related activities associated with the operation and maintenance of in-plant electrical power distribution systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
